catalog_info.title: Creative Music: Critical Practice Studio
catalog_info.notes: Between December 22 and January 12, each student should submit a recording, up to fifteen minutes in
catalog_info.description: This course is an intensive, research-oriented workshop environment for advanced improviser-composers. Open to both undergraduate and graduate students. Through critical listening, readings, term papers, and collaborative musical projects, students will engage with a range of contemporary musical perspectives and practices. Graduate students are welcome.
